Description: 2003 Aria FA-80. Walnut finish. Made in Korea. Case is not original to the guitar. This guitar is in all ways in excellent condition. Almost no wear to frets. Almost no sign of cosmetic wear. Electronics work properly. Action is good with no buzzing up and down the neck. This is Aria's high end guitar. High quality construction. Pickups are clear and distinctive (in the Gretsch Filter Tron style). Coil Tap Switch changes pickups from humbucker to single coil. Bigsby B-70 trem. Rosewood fingerboard. This is a better guitar than a Gretsch 5420 and within sight of a 6120 though it is not an exact copy of either of those guitars. Case has cosmetic wear but is in good working condition. Ships to USA only. FA-80 specs Body:Lami. Maple Arched Top, Back and Sides, 16 inch Full BodyNeck:Maple, Set-NeckFingerboard:RosewoodNumber of Frets:22Scale Length:648mm (25-1/2 inches)Pickups:HH-1 Humbucker x 2Controls:Master Volume x 1, Volume x 2, Tone x 2, PU Selector Switch x 1, Coil Tap Switch x 1Tailpiece:Bigsby B-70 Vibrato UnitHardware:ChromeFinishes:Orange (OR), Wine Red (WR), Walnut (WA)
Title: 2003 Aria FA-80 Hollowbody Ex Condition w/ HSC Made in Korea
